channel.title: Evolution
channel.desc: When a meteor crashes on Earth, it brings with it single-celled organisms which evolve rapidly. Later, four professionals stumble upon these aliens and must stop their growth to avoid an invasion.

channel.title: America's Sweethearts
channel.desc: When Kiki helps facilitate a final public appearance between her famous boss and her estranged husband, she experiences an unexpected spark of attraction and falls for him.

channel.title: Jerry Maguire
channel.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire tries to get back on his feet after being fired from his job. However, the only client he has is Rod Tidwell, a disgruntled football player who wants a better contract.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Ultraviolet
channel.desc: A female rebel is infected with a virus that provides her with superhuman abilities. Thereafter, she tries to safeguard a boy in a futuristic world, who carries the virus's antigen.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Superfly
channel.desc: After surviving an attack from a rival, drug kingpin Priest decides to quit after one last job. But the job goes awry and now he has to deal with blackmail, trigger-happy gang members and the police.

channel.title: Knights of the Zodiac
channel.desc: Teenager Seiya makes a living fighting on the streets while searching for his kidnapped sister. However, his life changes when he taps into mystical powers he never knew he had.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
channel.desc: Sonny and Sam find an ancient manuscript in an abandoned house while cleaning it. However, things escalate when the text brings a ventriloquist dummy named Slappy to life.
